events.platypush.message.event.music.MusicPause: if the playback state changed to pause
events.platypush.message.event.music.MusicPlayE: if the playback state changed to play
events.platypush.message.event.music.MusicStopE: if the playback state changed to stop
events.platypush.message.event.music.MuteChange: if the mute status has changed
events.platypush.message.event.music.NewPlaying: if a new track is being played
events.platypush.message.event.music.PlaylistCh: if the main playlist has changed
events.platypush.message.event.music.SeekChange: if a track seek event occurs
events.platypush.message.event.music.VolumeChan: if the main volume has changed
